item.title: HackTheBox - Uitdagingen - Crypto - Bankroof
item.category: "hackthebox" , "cryptografie" , "T9-code" , "multitap cijfer" , "atbash cijfer" , "cyberveiligheid" , "decoderen" , "cijfertekst" , "uitdaging" , "vlag" , "cyberbeveiliging" , "hacken" , "leren" , "handleiding" , "decoderen van cijfers" , "puzzels oplossen" , "codebreker" , "cryptografie-uitdaging" , "cyberbeveiligingsvaardigheden" , "online onderwijs"
item.description: Learn how to decode T9/Multitap and Atbash ciphers to solve the Bank Heist challenge on HackTheBox.
